content: It's official: The Patient Innovator Track at DevDays Amsterdam 2019. Thank you @Mikael Rinnetm√§ki @Dave deBronkart @*Grahame Grieve. Know someone who might want to participate? Please forward this link: * https://www.devdays.com/amsterdam/patient-track/

I've started a thread for discussion, strategy etc in the #patient empowerment stream.
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179262-patient-empowerment/topic/Patient.20Innovator.20Track.20.40.20DevDays/near/174518921

Hope those of you who attended DevDays Amsterdam 2019 enjoyed the event. It has grown quite a bit since we started in 2014. Now we are looking for a DevDays Content Lead to make it even bigger. https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/193771-work-opportunities/topic/DevDays.20Organizer/near/180416531

We still accept applications for the DevDays US 2020 Patient Innovator Track and Startup Track. Patients who are selected have free access to DevDays and a chance to win $2500. Selected Startups get a steep discount to the event and a chance to win $2500.

With DevDays being a virtual event, we also invite participants from outside North America. You might have to stay up late or get up early :grinning:.

Details and registration on the DevDays website: https://www.devdays.com/us/ :fire:

Rien Wertheim said:

We still accept applications for the DevDays US 2020 Patient Innovator Track ... Patients who are selected have free access to DevDays and a chance to win $2500. Selected Startups get a steep discount to the event and a chance to win $2500.

Thanks, @Rien ! Additional info, all: https://www.epatientdave.com/2020/04/21/announcing-the-inaugural-american-patient-innovator-track-at-fhir-devdays/

:rocket: The DevDays Startup Track is still accepting a few more submissions until the end of this month!
With a short virtual pitch your company could win the DevDays Startup cash prize of $2500 and make themselves visible to all major health tech players worldwide.

Just a few days left until the deadline for the Call for Presentations for DevDays November 2020. Share you knowledge with the FHIR community and submit your talk proposals here: https://bit.ly/2EJKpCA. Project presentations on lessons learned and best practices are welcome as well (in the "Community Track").

:fire: Last week, we had a great time at DevDays US 2021 with lots of new and exciting content ü§©. This also means we are already a half year past the DevDays Europe 2020 edition. Therefore, we have just published all the available videos on the DevDays YouTube channel üì∫ and other content (e.g. slide decks) on devdays.com/events üñ•Ô∏è.

FHIR DevDays announcement: No November edition this year, so we can put all our efforts towards going fully hybrid (virtual + in-person) and international
https://fire.ly/2021/07/09/the-future-of-fhir-devdays

Block your calendars for the next edition:
:calendar: Week of June 6, 2022
:pin: Cleveland, US (and virtual)

Questions and discussion welcome in #DevDays Support

From our Firely friends:
üïë‚úà time flies! We are more than a half year past the DevDays June 2021 edition and have uploaded all available videos to the DevDays YouTube channel. Other content, such as slide decks, can be found on devdays.com under previous editions.

Hope to see you virtually or in real life at the next DevDays edition, June 6-9 2022!

On behalf of @Ward Weistra and the HL7 and Firely DevDays Team: The call for presentations for DevDays 2022 is now open. The deadline for submission is February 1, 2022. More about the call for presentations can be found here: https://www.devdays.com/call-for-presentations.

DevDays 2022 will be the first international edition of DevDays, a merger between the US and European editions. This will be a hybrid event, the in-person event taking place in Cleveland, OH. Please mark the dates in your calendar: June 6 to 9, 2022.

We look forward to many submissions. Happy holidays everyone.

The deadline for submitting your talks for HL7 FHIR DevDays is this Tuesday (Feb 1, 2022): https://www.devdays.com/call-for-presentations/

  • DevDays this year takes place June 6-9, 2022 in Cleveland, OH and online.
  • Registration will open March 1st.
